first_title.title: Introduction to Soil Science
first_title.description: A comprehensive lesson plan for middle school students exploring soil composition, types, and importance in agriculture.

first_title.title: Water Quality Testing Activity
first_title.description: Hands-on activity guide for testing water pH, turbidity, and dissolved oxygen. Includes student worksheets and safety protocols.

first_title.title: Plant Growth & Nutrition Lab
first_title.description: Interactive lab guide examining how different nutrients affect plant growth. Suitable for high school biology classes.

first_title.title: Climate Data Analysis Workshop
first_title.description: Step-by-step guide for students to analyze historical climate data and create visualizations.

second_title.title: Mississippi Soil Properties Dataset
second_title.description: County-level soil composition data including pH, organic matter content, and texture classification. CSV format with documentation.

second_title.title: Agricultural Yield Data (2015-2024)
second_title.description: Historical crop yield data for major Mississippi crops including cotton, soybeans, corn, and rice. Includes weather correlations.

second_title.title: Water Quality Monitoring Dashboard
second_title.description: Interactive dashboard showing real-time and historical water quality measurements from monitoring stations across the state.

second_title.title: Precipitation Patterns Dataset
second_title.description: Monthly precipitation data for Mississippi counties from 1990-2024. Perfect for climate studies and trend analysis.

third_title.title: Mississippi State University
third_title.description: Official MSU website with information about research programs, academic resources, and extension services.

third_title.title: MSU Extension Service
third_title.description: Resources for farmers, educators, and communities including publications, programs, and local county offices.

third_title.title: Agricultural & Biological Engineering
third_title.description: MSU ABE department focusing on sustainable agricultural systems, water resources, and environmental engineering.

third_title.title: USDA Natural Resources Conservation Service
third_title.description: Federal agency providing conservation technical assistance and financial support for agricultural producers.

third_title.title: National Science Foundation
third_title.description: Primary federal funding agency supporting fundamental research and education in science and engineering.

third_title.title: Mississippi Department of Agriculture
third_title.description: State agency overseeing agricultural programs, farmer resources, and food safety regulations.

fourth_title.title: Laboratory Safety Guidelines
fourth_title.description: Comprehensive safety protocols for conducting experiments and fieldwork. Includes PPE requirements and emergency procedures.

fourth_title.title: Research Ethics for Student Projects
fourth_title.description: Guide to ethical considerations in research including data collection, privacy, informed consent, and responsible reporting.

fourth_title.title: Field Work Safety Checklist
fourth_title.description: Pre-activity checklist for outdoor data collection including weather considerations, equipment needs, and buddy system protocols.

fourth_title.title: Data Privacy & Security Best Practices
fourth_title.description: Guidelines for protecting participant information, securing data collection devices, and ensuring compliance with privacy regulations.

fourth_title.title: Chemical Safety Data Sheets
fourth_title.description: Access to MSDS/SDS for common laboratory chemicals used in soil and water testing activities.

fourth_title.title: Student Research IRB Guidelines
fourth_title.description: Information about when and how to obtain Institutional Review Board approval for student research projects involving human subjects.
